A4.text: Estimates of the proportion of Catholics in 2020 range between 47% and 88%.

A5.text: Islam is the second-largest religion in France after Christianity.

A6.text: The French overseas region of Mayotte has a majority Muslim population, with 97% of the population following Islam.

A7.text: Protestants form a minority of 3% in France.

A9.text: France has the largest Jewish population in Europe and the third-largest Jewish population in the world (after Israel and the United States).

A10.text: The Jewish community in France is estimated to number 480,000â€“550,000, depending in part on the definition being used.
